flawed_nl_solution:
The period the store had the TV was 2009-2001= <<2009-2001=11>>11 years.
The TV decreased by $35/year * 11 years = $<<35*11=385>>385.
So the price in 2009 was $1950 - $385 = $<<1950-385=1565>>1565.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
